FuncDef: This command puts the specified port or channel into a loopback mode.

ParaDef.Info: Places the associated port or channel into a line loopback mode. A line loopback loops frames received on the corresponding port or channels back to the remote router.
Places the associated port or channel into an internal loopback mode. A internal loopback loops the frames from the local router back at the framer.
Sends a signal to the remote device to provide a line loopback.
